entry.title: Adelloni - Light Brown - Queen Upholstered Platform Bedframe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Queen Bed Frame
Price: 429.99

Simplify your space and set the scene for a good night’s sleep with this upholstered bed. Clean lines and faux leather upholstery create the unfussy, modern silhouette you want to wake up to every morning.

Product Features
  • Includes queen-size upholstered headboard, footboard, rails and slats
  • Light brown faux leather upholstery
  • Nailhead trim
  • Exposed wood feet
  • Included slats eliminate the need for a foundation/box spring
  • Mattress available, sold separately
  • This headboard offers three height adjustments to accommodate various mattress thicknesses. Range is 48.75” up to 53.5”
  • Assembly required
Dimensions:
Inches: 65.5" W x 82.25" D x 54.5" H

entry.title: Adelloni - Gray - Queen Upholstered Platform Bedframe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Queen Bed Frame
Price: 429.99

Simplify your space and set the scene for a good night’s sleep with this upholstered bed. Clean lines and woven upholstery create the unfussy, modern silhouette you want to wake up to every morning.

Product Features
  • Includes queen-size upholstered headboard, footboard, rails and slats
  • Gray polyester upholstery
  • Nailhead trim
  • Exposed wood feet
  • Included slats eliminate the need for a foundation/box spring
  • Mattress available, sold separately
  • This headboard offers three height adjustments to accommodate various mattress thicknesses. Range is 48.75” up to 53.5”
  • Assembly required

Dimensions:
Inches: 65.5" W x 85.25" D x 54.5" H

entry.title: Lodanna - Queen Panel Bed with Storage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Queen Bed Frame
Price: 949.99

Modern gray finish with replicated wood grain. Cases and bed are accented with faceted chrome details. Large scaled chrome handle with faceted details. Headboards are accented with LED lighting and include a remote for color and brightness options. Headboards are accented with faux crystal tufted upholstery. Side roller glides for smooth operating drawers.

entry.title: Jorstad - Queen Upholstered Sleigh Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Queen Bed Frame
Price: 549.99

With a clean light gray finish flowing over the classic Louis Phillippe styling, the “Jorstad” bedroom collection flawlessly captures the essence of relaxed traditional design. The ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet along with the upholstered panel sleigh headboard with a textural gray-white fabric adorned with nail head detailing creates a beautiful bedroom collection you’ll be proud to own.

Made with Birch veneers and select hardwood solids and finished in a light gray paint for clean and crisp appearance.

Sleigh bed has an upholstered panel with a textural gray-white fabric with nail head detailing.

Jorstad - Gray - Queen UPH Sleigh HDBD/FTBD
62.38"W x 5.75"D x 47.25"H - 53.0 lbs 
Jorstad - Gray - Queen Sleigh Rails
62.5"W x 77.63"D x 13.13"H - 27.0 lbs
